data.eml:eml: Three new species of Fergusonina Malloch gall-flies (Diptera: Fergusoninidae) from terminal leaf bud galls on Eucalyptus (Myrtaceae) in south-eastern Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nelson, Leigh A., Scheffer, Sonja J., Yeates, David K. (2011): Three new species of Fergusonina Malloch gall-flies (Diptera: Fergusoninidae) from terminal leaf bud galls on Eucalyptus (Myrtaceae) in south-eastern Australia. Zootaxa 3112: 36-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207304
